title: 1975 Thriller - Murder on Flight 502 - The wrong seat number could mean you Die!

sources.title: 1975 Thriller - Murder on Flight 502 - The wrong seat number could mean you Die!
sources.description:
After a jet plane leaves New York en route to London, a note is found in the lounge with a message threatening to kill passengers. Soon, two passengers are killed. Captain Larkin must find the killer before the body count increases.

Director: George McCowan
Writer: David P. Harmon

Main actors:
Ralph Bellamy - Dr. Kenyon Walker
Polly Bergen - Mona Briarly
Farrah Fawcett - Karen White
Theodore Bikel - Otto Gruenwaldt
Sonny Bono - Jack Marshall
Dane Clark - Ray Garwood
Laraine Day - Claire Garwood
Fernando Lamas - Paul Barons
George Maharis - Robert Davenport
Hugh O'Brian - Detective Daniel Myerson
Molly Picon - Ida Goldman
Walter Pidgeon - Charlie Parkins
Robert Stack - Captain Larkin
Brooke Adams - Vera Franklin

Genres: Drama, Mystery, Thriller
Release Date: November 21, 1975
Filming Location: John F. Kennedy International Airport


00:00 Full Movie with subtitles
00:40 Flight 502 departs from New York to London with a diverse group of passengers.
10:15 Airline staff discover an anonymous note warning of impending murders on the flight.
25:30 Passenger Otto Gruenwaldt confronts Dr. Kenyon Walker, blaming him for his wife's death.
40:45 Detective Daniel Myerson begins investigating passengers after a murder occurs onboard.
55:00 Flight attendant Vera Franklin is found strangled, escalating tensions among passengers.
1:10:20 Myerson reveals his true identity and motives, holding passengers hostage.
1:25:35 Captain Larkin and crew subdue Myerson after a tense confrontation in the cabin.
1:30:00 Flight 502 lands safely in London, with passengers and crew reflecting on the ordeal.
